meanings.definition: The quality or state of being exceptional.
meanings.sent1: Her exceptional exceptionabilities in art class amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: His exceptional exceptionabilities in sports made him a star player.
meanings.sent3: The cat's exceptional exceptionabilities in catching mice made it the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The student's exceptional exceptionabilities in math were like a superpower.
meanings.sent5: The exceptional exceptionabilities of the singer left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: The ability to be an exception.
meanings.sent1: The company's exceptionabilities in customer service set them apart from the competition.
meanings.sent2: His exceptionabilities in problem-solving made him the go-to person in the office.
meanings.sent3: The dog's exceptionabilities in finding hidden treats always surprised its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her exceptionabilities in negotiation were like a secret weapon.
meanings.sent5: The exceptionabilities of the team leader made the project a success.
